name: 阿拉达纳·夏尔马
name_full: 阿拉达纳·夏尔马 Aradhana Sharma
introduction: Aradhana Sharma, a dynamic force in the entertainment industry, seamlessly weaves her prowess as an actor and dancer into a tapestry of talent. Known for her standout performances in web series, movies, and TV shows, Aradhana left an indelible mark as Meneka in the acclaimed Lakhan Leela Bhargava and brought charm to the small screen as Kiki, aka Kriti, in Barsatein. Delve into the vibrant world of this versatile artist as she continues to mesmerize audiences across various platforms.
